components.name: Plaid Banking Integration
components.description: Plaid API client for bank account linking and transaction retrieval. Uses Decimal for all monetary values. Supports sandbox, development, and production environments.
components.example_usage:
from library.components.banking.plaid import PlaidClient
client = PlaidClient(environment='sandbox')
accounts = client.get_accounts(access_token)

components.name: Banking Data Models
components.description: Common banking dataclasses: BankAccount, Transaction, BankConnection. Uses Decimal for all monetary values. Provider-agnostic design.
components.example_usage:
from library.components.banking import BankAccount, Transaction
account = BankAccount(id='acc_123', name='Checking', balance=Decimal('1000.00'))

components.name: Mercury Bank Integration
components.description: Async Mercury banking API client for accounts, transactions, ACH transfers, and recipient management. Decimal-only money handling.
components.example_usage:
from library.components.banking.mercury import MercuryClient
async with MercuryClient() as client:
    accounts = await client.get_accounts()
